title: Lights Out Management (LOM) (com.apple.lom)
description: Use this section to define settings for Lights Out Management (LOM).

ControllerCACertificateUUIDs.title: Controller CA Certificate UUIDs
ControllerCACertificateUUIDs.description: An array of UUIDs of payloads in this profile that contain certificates that will be used for controller certificate trustworthiness evaluation.

ControllerCertificateUUID.title: Controller Certificate UUID
ControllerCertificateUUID.description: UUID of a payload in this profile that contains the certificate of the LOM controller. Configures the device to accept LOMDeviceRequestCommand.

DeviceCACertificateUUIDs.title: Device CA Certificate UUIDs
DeviceCACertificateUUIDs.description: An array of UUIDs of payloads in this profile that contain certificates that will be used for device certificate trustworthiness evaluation.

DeviceCertificateUUID.title: Device Certificate UUID
DeviceCertificateUUID.description: UUID of a payload in this profile that contains the certificate of the LOM device. Configures the device to accept PowerON, PowerOFF, and Reset requests.
